header_text: You have been very busy and are having trouble keeping in contact with one of your best friends. You are usually good about calling them, but your schedule has been very hectic. As you think about their reaction to this lull in contact, you think that your friend will be upset.

elements.Text: Since you have been out of touch, your friend is probably thinking

buttons: "I'm sure things are just really busy right now."
"I guess this friendship isn't worth very much."
